summary: Completed comprehensive testing of NomadlyBot UX fixes implementation. All pending UX text/keyboard layout improvements successfully implemented and validated.

React frontend loads NomadlyBot dashboard

Node.js Express server accessible on port 5000 via proxy
All files (config.js, en.js, fr.js, hi.js, zh.js) pass Node.js syntax validation

config.js askValidAmount updated to 'Please enter a valid amount.'

showDepositNgnInfo grammar fix: 'wallet will be updated' (not 'will updated') in both config.js and en.js
